metadata.title: CVE-2024-42068 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Take return from set_memory_ro() into account with bpf_prog_lock_ro()set_memory_ro() can fail, leaving memory unprotected.Check its return and take it into account as an error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
